title: Role Management
description: Manage roles and their permissions in the system
cannotDeleteWithUsers: Cannot delete role with {count} assigned users
cannotDeleteWithUsersBatch: Cannot delete roles with assigned users
deleteConfirm: This will permanently delete {count} selected role(s). This action cannot be undone.
editRoleBasicDescription: Update role name, code, and description
createRoleDescription: Enter role details and assign permissions
descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the role and its responsibilities...
permissionsDescription: Select permissions for this role. You can select entire modules or individual permissions.

codeChangeWarning.title: ⚠️ Caution When Modifying Role Code
codeChangeWarning.description: Role code is used for permission control and system integration. Changes may affect existing functionality. Please ensure you understand the impact.

codeChangeConfirm.title: Confirm Role Code Modification
codeChangeConfirm.description: You are changing the role code from "{oldCode}" to "{newCode}". This may affect user permissions and system functionality.
codeChangeConfirm.warning: Are you sure you want to continue?

validation.nameMin: Role name must be at least {min} characters
validation.codeMin: Role code must be at least {min} characters
validation.codePattern: Role code must be lowercase letters and underscores only
validation.permissionsMin: Please select at least one permission
